title: Promotion Definition
description: Reusable promotion object definition for ecommerce events. Referenced by event schemas that include promotion data.

promotion.description: Represents a promotional offer or creative displayed to a user.

id.description: The unique identifier for the promotion.

name.description: The human-readable name of the promotion.

creative.description: The creative or variant associated with the promotion (e.g. 'banner_v2', 'hero_image').

position.description: The position or slot where the promotion was displayed (e.g. 'hero', 'sidebar_top').
